text: Take Off Your Clothes and Live! is a 1963 British naturist film directed by Arnold Louis Miller. It was partly shot in the south of France.Simon Sheridan, Keeping the British End Up: Four Decades of Saucy Cinema, Titan Books 2011 p 47-48 ==Premise== Various nudists gather in the south of France. ==References== ==External links== *Take Off Your Clothes and Live! at IMDb Category:British films Category:1963 films
